## ReactSerializer.serializeMark() method

Transform the provided mark into a JSX Element that wraps the current node

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
serializeMark(mark: Mark, inline: boolean, wrappedElement: ReactNode): ReactNode;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mark | <code>Mark</code> |  |
|  inline | <code>boolean</code> |  |
|  wrappedElement | <code>ReactNode</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ReactNode`
